channel.title: Battlescape - No Anti Leech, finally start building a Battlescape Server!
channel.description:
Hey guys, the Title pretty much says it all. A Battlescape Server with no Anti Leech. We need more servers with a good combat system, so lets get building guys!
[b]Changing Client Ip[/b] In Client.java [Client Sided] find.. [code]return new URL("http://127.0.0.1:" + (80));[/code] 127.0.0.1 is a local ip, Change the "127.0.0.1 to YOUSERVERIP, and your ready to go!
[b]Making yourself Owner[/b] Well now that you'll be able to use commands, you'll want to make yourself Owner on the server.
Client.java [Server Sided] find.. [code]"Palidino76"[/code] Replace all "Palidino76" with you account name. And you finished! [size=8pt][b]Note[/b]: Character Rights = 3 wont work [/size]without doing this.
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/a0gh0h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/xbj0bo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/qr1376.jpg[/img]
[b]Download Info[/b] -To be redirected to the download, click the download button. -[i]The download includes both the [b]S[/b][b]erver & Client[/b].[/i] [url=http://www.multiupload.com/1RXXHE0I6N][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2h2jel5.jpg[[/img][/url]
Credits - Palidno 95% - Samuel (Me) 5%

item.title: Battlescape - No Anti Leech, finally start building a Battlescape Server!
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

Bulletthrust:

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS- DONT download this unless you know how to fix a bunch of dupes and bugs as there is tons of them. I traded max cash to friend, i then spawned 100k, he gave me the max cash and it turned into 131gp. then go into trade and keep offering 1 gp at a time and it keeps offering randoms amounts and u can do this forever. therefore having infinite amount of cash dupe.

it can be fixed and if you can’t then well thats your prob? got to start learning somewhere and fixing a dupe is a good way to get credit for you work

[quote=“Chosen Pkz, post:51, topic:338636”][quote author=freakinlost link=topic=435020.msg3215565#msg3215565 date=1274645592]
question i did the client java adding my name but no crown still do i have to add them?

edit:: oo only player rights 2? ok i get it
[/quote]

Player rights 2 is admin, player rights 3 is owne rights. But owner rights will not work if you don’t replace all the “Palidino76” with your ingame name.[/quote]

k well when i did owner right and i put my name in the client.java ie. replaceing all the “Palidino76” with my name but when i speak no crown comes up when i speak but the rights works fine but just no crown

Read full topic
